data.persona: I am a soldier for the king.  He sends us to take land and battle other kingdoms.  I will always defend my kingdom.
data.description:
You are in the The tower base.
The tower base has a path of cobblestone leading to the entrance. Two torches are lit with large blazing fires. Most of the tower base is covered in moss.
There's a tower, a huge lock on door, a path, a moss, and a torch here.
The bat is here.

You are carrying a family heirloom, wearing an armor, and wielding a Daggers and a sword.

data.short_motivation: I remove my armor so I can better lift the lock
data.mid_motivation: I go to the barracks to gather a large group of soldiers to help me lift the lock
data.long_motivation: I lock the door to defend the base for many years to come
